## PopulatableKumo.openTrove() method

Open a new Trove by depositing collateral and borrowing KUSD.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
openTrove(params: TroveCreationParams<Decimalish>, maxBorrowingRate?: Decimalish): Promise<PopulatedKumoTransaction<P, SentKumoTransaction<S, KumoReceipt<R, TroveCreationDetails>>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | [TroveCreationParams](./lib-base.trovecreationparams.md)<!-- -->&lt;[Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md)<!-- -->&gt; | How much to deposit and borrow. |
|  maxBorrowingRate | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Maximum acceptable [borrowing rate](./lib-base.fees.borrowingrate.md)<!-- -->. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[PopulatedKumoTransaction](./lib-base.populatedkumotransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;P, [SentKumoTransaction](./lib-base.sentkumotransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [KumoReceipt](./lib-base.kumoreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, [TroveCreationDetails](./lib-base.trovecreationdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

If `maxBorrowingRate` is omitted, the current borrowing rate plus 0.5% is used as maximum acceptable rate.
